summary: r/The_Donald - /r/The_Donald was a subreddit on the website Reddit for supporters of United States president-elect Donald Trump. Members of the online community often refer to themselves as 'centipedes' and have been associated with the loose conservative group known as the 'alt-right'. Following the ban of the subreddit on June 29th, 2020, a standalone website bearing the name was launched, accommodating the subreddit's former audience.
